title: Canadians Reject Politics of Fear and Division: CLC hopeful for progressive change under Liberal government ...
text: ( Source : CLC - Canadian Labour Congress ) OTTAWA - The Canadian Labour Congress is congratulating Prime Minister-elect Justin Trudeau and the Liberal party on their election victory, and urging them to act quickly on key priorities for
